text: Mogens Emil Pedersen (9 May 1928 - 5 January 2014) was a Danish journalist and writer. Pedersen started working in 1949. He was best known as an editor for Se og HÃ¸r. Pedersen died on 5 January 2014, aged 85, in Gentofte Municipality. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Danish journalists Category:Danish writers
